item.title: David Elias - Podcast Collection Vol. 1
item.author: david@davidelias.com
item.description:
11 acoustic tracks (about 45 minutes) with different styles and backing musicians from SF Bay Area performing and recording artist. Has 7 CD's online at CD Baby including 2 award winning SA-CD's 'The Window' and 'Crossing'.

Click here to vote for Crossing as 'Best Title' in 2005 Surround Music Awards!

Hear individual tracks at MIXPOSURE

item.title: * Newest Song * - Aspen Rose by David Elias
item.author: david@davidelias.com
item.description: New acoustic track from SF Bay Area - enjoy! Lots of other tracks to hear at MIXPOSURE
